mapper.insert: insert into scan_result ( category, repo_id, scan_date, commit_id, commit_date, developer, new_count, eliminated_count, remaining_count ) values ( #{category}, #{repo_id}, #{scan_date}, #{commit_id}, #{commit_date}, #{developer}, #{new_count}, #{eliminated_count}, #{remaining_count} )
mapper.delete: delete from scan_result where repo_id = #{repo_id} and category = #{category}
mapper.select: select developer,sum(new_count) as new_count,sum(eliminated_count)as eliminated_count from scan_result where repo_id = #{repo_id} and category = #{category} and commit_date between #{start} and #{end} group by developer order by new_count desc,eliminated_count desc
select new_count from scan_result where repo_id = #{repo_id} and category = #{category} and commit_id = #{commit_id}
select eliminated_count from scan_result where repo_id = #{repo_id} and category = #{category} and commit_id = #{commit_id}
